SENT.plain: Patients suffering from various diseases are hospitalized in water beds for therapeutical reasons
By means of a detailed report on the course of the disease in 3 characteristic cases it can be shown, that water bed therapy is an useful additional therapeutic measure in critical situations
Thrombotic attacks, which take place as side-effects in some cases, seem to be caused by a retardation of the bloodstream and have to be treated with conventional antithrombotic therapy
Apart from hemodynamic factors also the temperature of the water might take part in provoking thrombotic attacks
